Articles.Content:
I go to save my plane, and suddenly there are no workspaces showing. Or, sometimes only some of the workspaces.  The only solution seems to be to restart the game.  There does not seem to be a specific trigger, though this comes on the tail of a few other happenings in the VAB, including at one point the disappearance of the new, save and open icons in the top right corner as well as an inability to launch.  I don't know if they are related or not.

 

I'm on Windows 10
